code: import axios from"axios";var url='http://localhost:3001/api';var getting=function getting(){var axiosBase=axios.get("".concat(url,"/data"));return axiosBase.then(function(resolve){return resolve.data;});};var posting=function posting(objectBase){var axiosBase=axios.post("".concat(url,"/data"),objectBase);return axiosBase.then(function(resolve){return resolve.data;});};var deleting=function deleting(id){var axiosBase=axios.delete("".concat(url,"/data/").concat(id));return axiosBase;};var putting=function putting(id,cambio){var axiosBase=axios.put("".concat(url,"/data/").concat(id),cambio);return axiosBase;};export var notesPhonebook={getting:getting,posting:posting,deleting:deleting,putting:putting};
